name: Supplication
description: Georges Polti's dramatic situation where a character must plead for mercy, help, or forgiveness
distribution_philosophy: Based on Polti's supplication situation emphasizing the need, plea, and response to the request for mercy

the_need.name: The Need
the_need.description: A desperate situation arises requiring help from another

the_approach.name: The Approach
the_approach.description: The supplicant prepares to ask for help

the_plea.name: The Plea
the_plea.description: The supplicant makes their desperate request

the_response.name: The Response
the_response.description: The person in power decides whether to grant mercy
